description: Updates setting configurations for your Amazon Inspector account. When you use this API as an Amazon Inspector delegated administrator this updates the setting for all accounts you manage. Member accounts in an organization cannot update this setting.

parameters.name: ec2Configuration
parameters.description: Specifies how the Amazon EC2 automated scan will be updated for your environment. The scan method that is applied to the instance.

nested_params.name: scanMode
nested_params.description: The scan method that is applied to the instance.

parameters.name: ecrConfiguration
parameters.description: Specifies how the ECR automated re-scan will be updated for your environment. pullDateRescanDuration (string) --- The rescan duration configured for image pull date. The rescan duration configured for image push date.

nested_params.name: pullDateRescanDuration
nested_params.description: The rescan duration configured for image pull date.

nested_params.name: rescanDuration
nested_params.description: The rescan duration configured for image push date.
